CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Save meeting content with collaborative annotations as a Whiteboard
CurrentVersion.description: Collaborative annotations, available now, enable meeting participants with the Presenter role to enable annotations after sharing their screen. This allows everyone in the meeting to draw, add a note, react, highlight text, and more to share their thoughts right on the content, live with everyone else. Now, participants sharing their screen will have the ability to save content with collaborative annotations as a Whiteboard, enabling all meeting participants to revisit this content and continue collaborating after the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Custom Topic Types for Viva Topics
CurrentVersion.description:
Knowledge Managers can define and edit custom topic types that can offer important context on the nature of the topic entity.

New Topic features will not continue in 2024. Please refer to the changes coming to Topics: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/topics/changes-coming-to-topics?view=o365-worldwide

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Custom Topic Types for Viva Topics
OldVersion.description: Knowledge Managers can define and edit custom topic types that can offer important context on the nature of the topic entity.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Topics bot brings you topic information to your Teams chat
CurrentVersion.description:
,We are introducing an exciting new way to interact with Topics. A new Teams bot for Viva Topics to bring important topic related information, activities and more to users on their Teams chat.

This feature will not rollout. Please refer to the changes coming to Topics: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/topics/changes-coming-to-topics?view=o365-worldwide

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Topics bot brings you topic information to your Teams chat
OldVersion.description:
,We are introducing an exciting new way to
interact with Topics. A new Teams bot for Viva Topics to bring important topic
related information, activities and more to users on their Teams chat.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Trending Topics
CurrentVersion.description:
,Viva Topics brings a new way to discover and learn about important and relevant topics in your organization through the trending topics experiences across M365.

This feature will not rollout. Please refer to the upcoming changes coming to Topics: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/topics/changes-coming-to-topics?view=o365-worldwide

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Trending Topics
OldVersion.description:
,Viva Topics brings a new way to discover and
learn about important and relevant topics in your organization through the
trending topics experiences across M365.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Editors cohort for topics
CurrentVersion.description:
,Knowledge managers can now select and assign a group of SMEs to a topic and invite them to validate and contribute to suggested, confirmed and published topics.

This feature will not continue. Please refer to changes coming to Topics: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/topics/changes-coming-to-topics?view=o365-worldwide

OldVersion.description:

group of SMEs to a topic and invite them to validate and contribute to
suggested, confirmed and published topics.

details.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Customize and edit emails for webinars (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Customize and edit content for webinar emails including registration confirmation, reminder emails, cancellation notices, and more.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Customize and edit emails for webinars (Premium)
OldVersion.description:
Customize and edit content for webinar emails
including registration confirmation, reminder emails, cancellation notices, and
more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Deploy your frontline operational hierarchy in the Teams Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to set up their frontline operational hierarchy to map their organizationâs structure of frontline teams/locations to a hierarchy in the Teams Admin Center. Admins can also define attributes for their teams that range from department information to brand information. The operational hierarchy coupled with this added metadata will enable numerous frontline apps and experiences in the future like task publishing and additional frontline capabilities that are coming soon.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Deploy your frontline operational hierarchy in the Teams Admin Center
OldVersion.description: Admins will be able to set up their frontline operational hierarchy to map their organizationâs structure of frontline teams/locations to a hierarchy in the Teams Admin Center. Admins can also define attributes for their teams that range from department information to brand information. The operational hierarchy coupled with this added metadata will enable numerous frontline apps and experiences in the future like task publishing and additional frontline capabilities that are coming soon.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Increased synergy between webapp and Teams App
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to easily switch within Viva Learning Teams app and Webapp.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Increased synergy between webapp and Teams App
OldVersion.description: Users will be able to easily switch within Viva Learning Teams app and Webapp.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Integrate Chat notification with Meeting RSVP status
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams users will be able to control how they get notified in meeting chats through RSVP to their meetings. When you decline a meeting, you will not receive notifications or see the chats in chat list; when you accept a meeting, you will receive notification for all new messages.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Integrate Chat notification with Meeting RSVP status
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Teams users will be able to control how they get notified in meeting chats through RSVP to their meetings. When you decline a meeting, you will not receive notifications or see the chats in chat list; when you accept a meeting, you will receive notification for all new messages.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals â Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: ,With Copilot in Viva Goals, user will be able to leverage AI in creating goals, summaries, and making updates in Viva Goals.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals â Copilot
OldVersion.description: ,With Copilot in Viva Goals, user will be able to leverage AI in creating goals, summaries, and making updates in Viva Goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Microsoft Information Protection (MIP) ML Classifier support
CurrentVersion.description: Leverage trainable classifiers from Microsoft Information Protection (MIP) to recognize various content types specific to your organization. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Microsoft Information Protection (MIP) ML Classifier support
OldVersion.description: Leverage trainable classifiers from Microsoft Information Protection (MIP) to recognize various content types specific to your organization. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Contribute to topics you are related to from your inbox
CurrentVersion.description:
Topics contribution email and Teams notifications will bring relevant topic information for users to review using simple Yes or No questions right from their inbox.

This feature will not continue rolling out. Please refer to upcoming changes to Topics: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/topics/changes-coming-to-topics?view=o365-worldwide

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Contribute to topics you are related to from your inbox
OldVersion.description: Topics contribution email and Teams notifications will bring relevant topic information for users to review using simple Yes or No questions right from their inbox.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Contribute to topics from the expanded topic card
CurrentVersion.description:
Expanded view of the topic card will now allow users to review the information on the topic and make quick edits to improve the topic.

This feature will not continue rolling out. Please refer to upcoming changes to Topics: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/topics/changes-coming-to-topics?view=o365-worldwide

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Contribute to topics from the expanded topic card
OldVersion.description: Expanded view of the topic card will now allow users to review the information on the topic and make quick edits to improve the topic.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Answers in Viva content in Workplace Search
CurrentVersion.description: Users searching from Microsoft Search surfaces will be able to find content from Answers in Viva that match their search.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Answers in Viva content in Workplace Search
OldVersion.description: Users searching from Microsoft Search surfaces will be able to find content from Answers in Viva that match their search.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva : Connections Analytics for multiple Connections experiences
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, customers using multiple Viva Connections experiences in their tenants will see analytics aggregated at each experience level. There will be no change in how the analytics module is accessed or any metrics provided.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva : Connections Analytics for multiple Connections experiences
OldVersion.description: With this feature, customers using multiple Viva Connections experiences in their tenants will see analytics aggregated at each experience level. There will be no change in how the analytics module is accessed or any metrics provided.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: MyTopics for all users in a Topics tenant
CurrentVersion.description:
,If your tenant has completed AI-indexing, a very small subset of topics will now be available to all users, even without an assigned Topics license. Any user in your organization will be able to view their associated "MyTopics" that appear in their "suggested" and "confirmed" connection webparts of Topic Center home, the Topic adaptive card for Viva Connections, and the People Profile card. They can confirm or remove these associations.

This feature will not rollout. Please refer to changes coming to Topics: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/topics/changes-coming-to-topics?view=o365-worldwide

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: MyTopics for all users in a Topics tenant
OldVersion.description: ,If your tenant has completed AI-indexing, a very small subset of topics will now be available to all users, even without an assigned Topics license. Any user in your organization will be able to view their associated "MyTopics" that appear in their "suggested" and "confirmed" connection webparts of Topic Center home, the Topic adaptive card for Viva Connections, and the People Profile card. They can confirm or remove these associations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Inactive teams and inactive domains report export capability
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to export the inactive teams and inactive domains reports to a csv file in Teams Admin Center.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Inactive teams and inactive domains report export capability
OldVersion.description: Admins will be able to export the inactive teams and inactive domains reports to a csv file in Teams Admin Center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: External call routing settings
CurrentVersion.description: End users will now be able to change their external call routing settings directly from the Teams app, allowing them to decide how incoming PSTN calls are routed. Calls can be redirected based on existing unanswered call settings or sent to voicemail. This new capability provides more flexibility for handling customer communications.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: External call routing settings
OldVersion.description: End users will now be able to change their external call routing settings directly from the Teams app, allowing them to decide how incoming PSTN calls are routed. Calls can be redirected based on existing unanswered call settings or sent to voicemail. This new capability provides more flexibility for handling customer communications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Information Protection and Insider Risk Management support multicloud environments
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft Purview Information Protection extends its sensitivity labels and protection policies into data contained in Azure SQL, Azure Data Lake Storage, and Amazon S3. Organizations can create label-based protection policies that specify which data sources, databases, or storage buckets are in scope, and which users or groups are allowed to access data with a certain sensitivity label and Purview will automatically enforce the policy and block unauthorized access to sensitive data. Insider Risk Management extends its detection into multicloud environments by offering ready-to-use risk indicators in Azure, AWS, and SaaS apps including Box, Dropbox, and Google Drive. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management-Insider Risk Management supports multicloud environments
OldVersion.description: ,Insider Risk Management extends its detection into multicloud environments by offering ready-to-use risk indicators in Azure, AWS, and SaaS apps including Box, Dropbox, and Google Drive. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Bookings: Bookings in GCC High and DoD
CurrentVersion.description: With this update, Bookings will be available to customers in GCC High and DoD environments.

OldVersion.title: Bookings: Bookings in GCC High and DoD
OldVersion.description: With this update, Bookings will be available to customers in GCC High and DoD environments.

CurrentVersion.title: Exchange: Microsoft Defender for Office 365 - Quarantine End User Allow and Block list management
CurrentVersion.description: We are Updating the experience for end user allow and block list management of their emails. With one click, end users will block emails from unwanted senders and prevent those emails from showing up in their default quarantine view anymore as well as in their Quarantine notifications. End users will also be able to allow emails from trusted senders and prevent future emails from those senders from landing in quarantine given there are no Admin overrides in place. End users will also have visibility into Admin overrides that led to a Quarantined email message if there is one.

OldVersion.title: Exchange: Microsoft Defender for Office 365 - Quarantine End User Allow and Block list management
OldVersion.description: We are Updating the experience for end user allow and block list management of their emails. With one click, end users will block emails from unwanted senders and prevent those emails from showing up in their default quarantine view anymore as well as in their Quarantine notifications. End users will also be able to allow emails from trusted senders and prevent future emails from those senders from landing in quarantine given there are no Admin overrides in place. End users will also have visibility into Admin overrides that led to a Quarantined email message if there is one.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft To Do: Grid view for tasks in Microsoft To Do
CurrentVersion.description: Tasks can now be seen in a grid view in the web version of Microsoft To Do as well as when using To Do in other apps like Microsoft Outlook.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft To Do: Grid view for tasks in Microsoft To Do
OldVersion.description: Tasks can now be seen in a grid view in the web version of Microsoft To Do as well as when using To Do in other apps like Microsoft Outlook.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Teams meeting chat will take the meeting transcript into account
CurrentVersion.description: When you ask Copilot in the meeting chat a question, it will use the chat and transcript content as the source.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Teams meeting chat will take the meeting transcript into account
OldVersion.description: When you ask Copilot in the meeting chat a question, it will use the chat and transcript content as the source.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connections Advanced Analytics
CurrentVersion.description: Enhancements to the current analytics module for Viva Connections will include the following: daily data for 90 days, user retention metrics, and monthly aggregates for the last 12 months.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connections Advanced Analytics
OldVersion.description: Enhancements to the current analytics module for Viva Connections will include the following: daily data for 90 days, user retention metrics, and monthly aggregates for the last 12 months.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365: Microsoft Copilot with graph grounded chat in the Microsoft 365 mobile app
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft 365 mobile app users with a Copilot for Microsoft 365 license will be able to receive answers grounded in their organizational graph data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity label grouping modernization
CurrentVersion.description: ,To help improve label usability and configuration, the sensitivity labeling scheme will be simplified to only consist of labels and label groupings. These new label groupings allow admins to better organize and categorize their labels (previously done via parent labels).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity label grouping modernization
CurrentVersion.description: ,To help improve label usability and configuration, the sensitivity labeling scheme will be simplified to only consist of labels and label groupings. These new label groupings allow admins to better organize and categorize their labels (previously done via parent labels).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Desktop Shortcut for New Enterprise Devices
CurrentVersion.description: For new enterprise devices running through Windows Out of Box Experience (OOBE) for the first time, an Edge desktop shortcut will automatically be created. When enterprise users turn on their Windows 11 devices for the first time, they'll see the Edge shortcut on their desktop. This desktop shortcut will provide users with easy access to their Edge browser without needing to manually pin and configure their setup.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Updated reauthentication flyout when Web Single Sign-On fails
CurrentVersion.description: Users who encounter Web Single Sign-On (SSO) failures for User Interaction Required (UIR) accounts will experience a flyout with a call to action to sign in and verify their account.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections Analytics in GCC
CurrentVersion.description: The customer facing analytics module will allow customers to understand the usage metrics for their instance of Viva Connections and will help them gauge the health of their VC deployment.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Dashboard personalization on tablet in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: Customize your dashboard by adding, removing, or reordering the dashboard cards.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Revamped Resources on mobile and tablet
CurrentVersion.description: The Resources section on Viva Connections mobile and tablet will show content from the recently revamped Resources section on Viva Connections desktop.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Workspace Management
CurrentVersion.description: We are not releasing this feature at this time and apologize for any inconvenience. Workspace Management is a new feature within Teams Admin Center that provides an integrated view of Teams devices and peripherals based on their location, along with relevant insights. This capability provides IT admins the ability to manage connected devices, and monitor workspace health, utilization and conformance to standards at any location.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Workspace Management
OldVersion.description:
Workspace Management is a new feature within Teams Admin
     Center that provides an integrated view of Teams devices and peripherals
     based on their location, along with relevant insights. This capability provides
     IT admins the ability to manage connected devices, and monitor workspace
     health, utilization and conformance to standards at any location.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams Rooms Managed Services: Bulk suppression of rooms enrolled in Managed Services
CurrentVersion.description: Workflow to turn off all signals for rooms and specify when the signals need to be turned back on.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams Rooms Managed Services: Bulk suppression of rooms enrolled in Managed Services
OldVersion.description: Workflow to turn off all signals for rooms and specify when the signals need to be turned back on.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Updated reauthentication flyout when Web Single Sign-On fails
CurrentVersion.description: Users who encounter Web Single Sign-On (SSO) failures for User Interaction Required (UIR) accounts will experience a flyout with a call to action to sign in and verify their account.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections Analytics in GCC
CurrentVersion.description: The customer facing analytics module will allow customers to understand the usage metrics for their instance of Viva Connections and will help them gauge the health of their VC deployment.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Dashboard personalization on tablet in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: Customize your dashboard by adding, removing, or reordering the dashboard cards.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Revamped Resources on mobile and tablet
CurrentVersion.description: The Resources section on Viva Connections mobile and tablet will show content from the recently revamped Resources section on Viva Connections desktop.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Workspace Management
CurrentVersion.description: We are not releasing this feature at this time and apologize for any inconvenience. Workspace Management is a new feature within Teams Admin Center that provides an integrated view of Teams devices and peripherals based on their location, along with relevant insights. This capability provides IT admins the ability to manage connected devices, and monitor workspace health, utilization and conformance to standards at any location.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams Rooms Managed Services: Bulk suppression of rooms enrolled in Managed Services
CurrentVersion.description: Workflow to turn off all signals for rooms and specify when the signals need to be turned back on.
